past.title: Community Kickstart 2020 x Kickstart Competitive Programming with Aarnav Jindal
past.description: We will be introducing the DSC and going in-depth so as to why a community like DSC matters. In the second half of the session, which is open for all students from any college, We are going live with AARNAV JINDAL, who has hands-on experience with Competitive Programming, Development, and many more thing to learn about "ABC's of Competitive Programming" and kickstart you on your journey of CP.
